TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PromptBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 创建空的 对象，并为添加内容、选择语音、控件语音属性和控件朗读单词的发音提供方法。

span.span: Creates an empty object and provides methods for adding content, selecting voices, controlling voice attributes, and controlling the pronunciation of spoken words.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与，可以添加各种内容类型添加到提示符处，包括纯文本、 SSML 标记 （作为字符串或文件） 录制音频，或甚至另一个对象。With , you can add a variety of content types to a prompt, including plain text, SSML markup (as a string or a file), recorded audio, or even another object. 要追加到文本对象，并根据需要控制语音属性，如重点、 速率和卷，则使用其中一个方法。To append text to a object and optionally control voice attributes such as emphasis, rate, and volume, use one of the methods. 您还可以控制语音属性为包含的组和方法。You can also control voice attributes as a group with the and methods. 可以将文本追加和控制所说内容或它的发音使用如何， ， ， ，或方法。You can append text and control what is spoken or how it is pronounced using the , , , , or methods. 更改在提示符下使用的重载之一中当前所选的讲话声音所需的方法，命名使用或指定特定语音语音特征，例如年龄和性别。Change the currently selected speaking voice in the prompt using one of the overloaded methods, naming a specific voice to use or specifying required voice characteristics, such as age and gender. 若要生成从语音对象，可以将其作为参数传递方法。To generate speech from a object, you can pass it as an argument to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[构造复杂提示](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361616(v%3doffice.14))。For more information, see [Constructing a Complex Prompt](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361616(v%3doffice.14)).

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供有关特定区域性的信息，如其语言、区域性的名称、写入系统、使用的日历以及如何设置日期和排序字符串。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture, such as its language, the name of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例并指定区域性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies a culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置的值属性。This constructor sets the value for the property. 对象将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`参数以处理提示。The object will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to process the prompt. 如果找到具有指定的区域性的语音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定的区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 要正确地说出指定的语言中的单词`culture`必须安装支持语言的语音合成 （文字到语音或 TTS） 引擎参数。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎，则为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取特定区域性的安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - zh CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - zh-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. ## Examples 下面的示例中创建实例并指定其。The example that follows creates a instance and specifies its . ```csharp using System.Speech.Synthesis; public void MySimpleText () { PromptBuilder builder = new PromptBuilder(new System.Globalization.CultureInfo("en-US")); builder.AppendText("Hello world!"); } ``` 以下标记显示等效的 SSML:The following markup shows the equivalent SSML: ```xml Hello world! ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendSsmlMarkup(string ssmlMarkup) cil managed

param.name: ssmlMarkup
param.span: 一个包含 SSML 标记的字符串。

span.span: A string containing SSML markup.

summary.span: 将包含 SSML 标记的指定字符串追加到 对象。

span.span: Appends the specified string containing SSML markup to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加的 SSML 标记时，必须使用适当的转义符。You must use the appropriate escape characters when appending SSML markup. 请注意，向后的斜杠前面包含它的值的引号`interpret-as`下面的示例中的属性：Notice the backward-slashes preceding the quotation marks enclosing the value of the `interpret-as` attribute in the following example: ```csharp builder.AppendSsmlMarkup(" chair "); ``` > [!NOTE] > 使用作为参数的字符串不能包含`speak`元素。The string used as an argument to cannot include a `speak` element. 使用时以指定在内联发音`phoneme`元素，可以使用任何以下的注音字母表，提供当前语音引擎支持它的电话：When using to specify inline pronunciations in a `phoneme` element, you can use phones from any of the following phonetic alphabets, provided that the current speech engine supports it: - 国际音标 (IPA)International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) - 通用电话集 (UPS)Universal Phone Set (UPS) - 设置 SAPI 电话SAPI Phone Set 任何符合 SSML 语音引擎将从 IPA 进行朗读手机。Any SSML-compliant speech engine will speak phones from the IPA. 也可以附加文件包含 SSML 标记使用之一方法。You can also append a file containing SSML markup using one of the methods. 若要追加文本要朗读的未使用标记语言进行格式化，请使用之一， ， ，或方法。To append text to be spoken that is not formatted with markup language, use one of the , , , or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 中的语音合成引擎在此时间不支持强调参数。The speech synthesis engines in Windows do not support the emphasis parameter at this time. 设置强调参数的值将会产生合成的语音输出中没有声音更改。Setting values for the emphasis parameter will produce no audible change in the synthesized speech output.

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并指定在该追加的文本位置处朗读的别名文本。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the alias text to be spoken in place of the appended text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这允许文档包含语音和提示书面的形式。This allows a document to contain both a spoken and a written form for a prompt. 例如，书面的形式可能是首字母缩写词，如 SAPI、 和口头的形式可能是首字母缩写词，在此事例语音应用程序编程接口的扩展的文本。For example, the written form could be an acronym, such as SAPI, and the spoken form could be the expanded text for the acronym, in this case Speech Application Programming Interface. ## Examples 下面的示例将文本字符串 （"语音合成标记语言"） 和其别名 ("SSML") 追加到对象。The following example appends a text string ("Speech Synthesis Markup Language") and its alias ("SSML") to a object. 合成器将说出"S S M L"。The synthesizer will pronounce "S S M L". ``` PromptBuilder alias = new PromptBuilder(); alias.AppendTextWithAlias("Speech Synthesis Markup Language","SSML"); ```

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并指定该文本的内容类型。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the content type of the text.

span.span: Appends text to the object and a that specifies the content type of the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法来指定内容类型中不包含枚举。You can use this method to specify a content type that is not included in the enumeration. 但是，TTS 引擎必须支持您指定的参数。However, the TTS engine must support the parameter that you specify.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendTextWithPronunciation (string textToSpeak, string pronunciation);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendTextWithPronunciation(string textToSpeak, string pronunciation) cil managed
Public Sub AppendTextWithPronunciation (textToSpeak As String, pronunciation As String)

param.name: textToSpeak
param.span: 包含使用语言传统字母表写入形式的单词的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the written form of the word using the conventional alphabet for a language.

param.name: pronunciation
param.span: 包含要以国际音标 (IPA) 进行朗读的电话的字符串。

span.span: A string containing phones to be spoken from the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并为该文本指定发音。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the pronunciation for the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容的语言合成`pronunciation`参数，不包括的内容`textToSpeak`参数。The synthesizer speaks the contents of the `pronunciation` parameter, not the contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter. 在提示中的内联指定的发音仅适用于 word 的各个匹配项，并重写发音的语音引擎或任何其当前处于活动状态的词典。Pronunciations specified inline in prompts apply only to the individual occurrence of a word and override pronunciations of the speech engine or any of its currently active lexicons. 通常情况下，将使用内联发音为自定义现有字词的发音或不常见的单词，如专有名词，该的语音合成引擎可能的发音，以及预期的发音。Typically, you will use inline pronunciations for custom pronunciations of existing words or for pronunciation of uncommon words, such as proper names, which the speech synthesis engine may not pronounce as well as expected. 必须使用手机从国际音标 (IPA) 来指定内联发音。Inline pronunciations must be specified using phones from the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA). 手机就是以字母或表示语音的离散声音的字符。A phone is a letter or character that represents a discreet sound of speech. 符合的语音引擎[语音合成标记语言 (SSML) 版本 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)规范将发音 IPA 的电话。Speech engines that comply with the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763) specification will pronounce phones from the IPA. 若要指定使用其他的注音字母表的内联发音，请参阅。To specify inline pronunciations using other phonetic alphabets, see . IPA 将发布[图表](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58362)，列出其电话，并将它们映射到 Unicode 数字。The IPA publishes a [chart](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58362) that lists its phones and maps them to Unicode numbers. IPA 字母表中的某些电话拉丁字母表中具有相同的表示形式为字母。Some phones in the IPA alphabet have the same representations as letters in the Latin alphabet. 在这些情况下，很可能键入拉丁字符，并让手机的正确表示形式。In those cases, it is possible to type the Latin character and have the proper representation for a phone. 因为常用文本中使用的拉丁字符可能代表 IPA 电话集的多个电话，只需键入拉丁字符可能导致所需的精确 IPA 手机。Because the Latin characters as commonly used in text may represent several phones of the IPA phone set, simply typing the Latin character might not result in the precise IPA phone desired. IPA 字母表需在代码中表示其他手机字符引用组成 & 号 (&)、 数字符号 （#），并以十六进制或十进制、 所需的电话 Unicode 数字所有后跟分号 （;）。Other phones of the IPA alphabet need to be represented in code as character references consisting of an ampersand (&), the number sign (#), and a Unicode number for the desired phone in hexadecimal or decimal, all followed by a semicolon (;). 例如，schwa (&\#x0259;) 将由表示`ə`。For example, a schwa (&\#x0259;) would be represented by `ə`. 若要添加新的或自定义多个单词的发音，例如为 express 区域方言或添加正确的名称或特定于教育或医疗专业的词汇，生成词典，并将其添加到使用。To add new or custom pronunciations for multiple words, for example to express regional dialects or to add proper names or vocabulary that is specific to an educational or medical discipline, build a lexicon and add it to the using . ## Examples 下面的示例初始化的新实例类。The following example initializes a new instance of the class. 它然后将追加的文本字符串"My name is"的实例。It then appends the text string "My name is" to the instance. 最后，它将追加包含正确的名称"DuBois"的字符串，并指定名称的发音。Finally, it appends a string containing the proper name "DuBois" and specifies the pronunciation of the name. ```csharp public void ProperName() { PromptBuilder builder = new PromptBuilder(); builder.AppendText("My name is"); // Add a proper name and its pronunciation. builder.AppendTextWithPronunciation("DuBois", "duˈbwɑ"); } ``` 以下标记显示 SSML 此对象生成。The following markup shows the SSML that this object generates. ```xml My name is DuBois ```

span.span: International Phonetic Association

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearContent() cil managed

summary.span: 清除 对象中的内容。

span.span: Clears the content from the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); void set(System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ value); };
member this.Culture : System.Globalization.CultureInfo with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的区域性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the culture information for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音属性来处理提示。The object will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the property to process the prompt. 如果找到具有指定的区域性的语音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定的区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 此外可以在提示中的内容使用的离散部分指定区域性， ，和方法。A culture may also be specified within the prompt for discreet sections of content using the , , and methods. 为使用上述方法之一的内容部分将替代指定的区域性属性而实际上，并将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`方法参数。A culture specified for a portion of content using one of the above methods will override the property while in effect, and the will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter of the method. 要正确地说出指定的语言中的单词必须安装属性，支持语言的语音合成 （文字到语音或 TTS） 引擎。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the property, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎，则为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取特定区域性的安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - zh CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - zh-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. 请参阅[语言标识符常量和字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd318693\(VS.85\).aspx)有关语言代码的完整列表。See [Language Identifier Constants and Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd318693\(VS.85\).aspx) for a comprehensive list of language codes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndParagraph() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的段落结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a paragraph in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们细分成句子和段落长提示后，可以将其呈现为更像人的语音。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndSentence() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的句子结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a sentence in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们细分成句子和段落长提示后，可以将其呈现为更像人的语音。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndStyle() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的样式结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a style in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法停止当前的说话风格。The method stops the current speaking style. 说话风格会恢复为有效之前已设置方法启动新的说话风格。The speaking style reverts to the setting that was in effect before the method initiated a new speaking style. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndVoice() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的语音使用结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of use of a voice in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法停止使用当前的语音的语音输出。The method stops the use of the current voice for speech output. 语音恢复为有效之前已设置方法启动一个新的声音。The voice reverts to the setting that was in effect before the method initiated a new voice.

span.span: Specifies the start of a paragraph in the specified culture in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们细分成句子和段落长提示后，可以将其呈现为更像人的语音。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. `culture`段落的参数可以为不同于属性的对象，其中包含它。The `culture` parameter for a paragraph can be different than the property of the object that contains it. 实际上，虽然的值`culture`参数将重写属性。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property. 将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`参数要朗读的段落。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the paragraph. 如果找到具有指定的区域性的语音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定的区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用指定的语音，调用。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 要正确地说出指定的语言中的单词`culture`必须安装支持语言的语音合成 （文字到语音或 TTS） 引擎参数。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎，则为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取特定区域性的安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - zh CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - zh-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们细分成句子和段落长提示后，可以将其呈现为更像人的语音。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. `culture`句子的参数可以为不同于`culture`参数包含该句子的段落或属性的包含它们的对象。The `culture` parameter for a sentence can be different than the `culture` parameter for the paragraph that contains the sentence or the property of the object that contains them. 实际上，虽然的值`culture`参数将重写属性和`culture`参数包含该句子的段落。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property and the `culture` parameter for the paragraph that contains the sentence. 将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`参数要朗读的句子。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the sentence. 如果找到具有指定的区域性的语音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定的区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用指定的语音，调用。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 要正确地说出指定的语言中的单词`culture`必须安装支持语言的语音合成 （文字到语音或 TTS） 引擎参数。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎，则为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取特定区域性的安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - zh CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - zh-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartStyle(class System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle style) cil managed

param.name: style
param.span: 要开始的样式。

summary.span: 指定 对象中的样式开始。

span.span: Specifies the start of a style in the object.

summary.span: 指示合成器更改 对象中的语音。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音表示已安装的 TTS 引擎。A voice represents an installed TTS engine. 使用方法和类来获取的名称和属性的安装可以选择的文本到语音转换 (TTS) 语音。Use the methods and class to obtain the names and attributes of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 当应用程序调用，该方法会验证在注册表中找到的语音的每个满足某些最低标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 未通过验证，任何语音设置其属性设置为`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序不能调用的任何语音方法其属性是`False`。An application cannot call any of the methods on a voice whose property is `False`. 通常情况下，应用程序不会设置语音属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `culture`参数可以不同于属性的对象，其中包含它。The `culture` parameter for can be different than the property of the object that contains it. 实际上，虽然的值`culture`参数将重写属性。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property. 将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`参数要朗读的内容括在和。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the content enclosed by and . 如果找到具有指定的区域性的语音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定的区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用指定的语音，调用。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 要正确地说出指定的语言中的单词`culture`必须安装支持语言的语音合成 （文字到语音或 TTS） 引擎参数。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎，则为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取特定区域性的安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - zh CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - zh-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

public: void StartVoice(System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceGender gender, System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceAge age, int voiceAlternate);
member this.StartVoice : System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceGender * System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceAge * int -> unit

param.name: gender
param.span: 要使用的语音的性别。

span.span: The gender of the voice to use.

param.name: age
param.span: 要使用的语音的年龄。

param.name: voiceAlternate
param.span: 在多个语音与 和 参数相匹配时指定首选语音的整数。

summary.span: 指示合成器更改 对象中的语音并指定其性别、年龄以及与指定的性别和年龄匹配的首选语音。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音合成引擎对计数的匹配项，它将找到为指定的参数，并返回语音时计数等于`voiceAlternate`参数。A speech synthesis engine counts the matches it finds for the specified parameters, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. 使用方法和类来获取的名称和属性的安装可以选择的文本到语音转换 (TTS) 语音。Use the methods and class to obtain the names and attributes of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 若要停止使用指定的语音调用。To stop using the voice specified by call .
